---
title: "Publications" 
author: "Frederick Boehm" 
date: "`r lubridate::now()`" 
output: html_document 
bibliography: boehm.bib 
---



```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(RefManageR)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, style = "markdown", bib.style = "authoryear", cite.style = 'alphabetic', sorting = "ydnt", style = "markdown", max.names = 6)
ReadBib("boehm.bib", check = FALSE) -> boehm
```

## Peer-reviewed journal articles


```{r, results = 'asis', echo = FALSE}
NoCite(boehm)
arts <- boehm[bibtype = "article"]
PrintBibliography(arts[keywords = "peer-reviewed"])
```

## Other articles


```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
PrintBibliography(arts[keywords = "other"])
```

## Edited books


```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
PrintBibliography(boehm[bibtype = "book"])
```



## Book chapters


```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
PrintBibliography(boehm[bibtype = "incollection"])
```



## Conference proceedings


```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
PrintBibliography(boehm[bibtype = "inproceedings"])
```
